title: Ow! 啊哟!
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question. Must Andy go to see the doctor?
听录音，然后回答问题。安迪需要去看医生吗?

text_and_translation.translation: 我滑了一跤，从楼梯上摔下来了。

text_and_translation.text: Yes, I have. I think that I've hurt my back.
text_and_translation.translation: 是啊，摔伤了。我想我把背摔坏了。

text_and_translation.text: Try and stand up. Can you stand up? Here. Let me help you.
text_and_translation.translation: 试试站起来。你能站起来吗？来，让我帮你。

text_and_translation.text: I'm sorry, Lucy. I'm afraid that I can't get up.
text_and_translation.translation: 对不起，露西，恐怕我站不起来。

text_and_translation.text: I think that the doctor had better see you. I'll phone Dr. Carter.
text_and_translation.translation: 我想最好请医生来给你看一下。我去给卡特医生打电话。

text_and_translation.text: The doctor says that he will come at once. I'm sure that you need an X-ray, Andy.
text_and_translation.translation: 医生说他马上就来。安迪，我看你需要做一次X光透视。

notes.title: slip and fall
notes.describe: 描述了安迪滑倒并从楼梯上摔下的情形。

notes.title: hurt oneself
notes.describe: 表示某人受伤，安迪认为自己背部受伤。

notes.title: try and do something
notes.describe: 表示尝试做某事，露西鼓励安迪尝试站起来。

notes.title: phone somebody
notes.describe: 表示给某人打电话，露西打算给医生打电话。

notes.title: at once
notes.describe: 表示立即，医生表示会立即前来。
